title: You cannot delete your account of this service. Getting banned will also not remove your account from site.

tosdr.case: You cannot delete your account of this service
tosdr.tldr: There's no way to delete your account. In case of violating terms of the site, your account will be banned, which means that you will be locked out of it. A banned account, it's data (your profile info, forum posts, etc) and dragons present on it are still visible for other players.
